title: The Way of Kings
description: Kachula is a lion cub born into a successful pride. He grows and learns surrounded by loving relatives, but the day comes when his father is overthrown. Then, his brother by his side, he must set out into the great wide world and seek his fortune. Follow his adventures as he struggles to survive in the dangerous environment of the African savannah - his triumphs, his defeats, his joys and his sorrows.
author: Louise Searl
